NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Other community, social and personal services

TI_TEXT.P: Услуги на здравеопазването и социалните дейности

Services de santé et services sociaux

Sveikatos priežiūros ir socialinio darbo paslaugos

ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Procurement and Logistics Service, Social Care Procurement Unit

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Procurement and Logistics Service, Social Care Procurement Unit
ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.ADDRESS: Pinewood Villa, Longstone Hospital, 73 Loughgall Road

SHORT_DESCR.P: The objectives of this procurement are:
1) To provide a Young Carers Service which is connected, through partnership arrangements, to relevant local agencies, including Health and Social Care Trusts the Education Authority and Schools;
2) To provide information to Young Carers and source such information from appropriate agencies such as the HSC Trusts and specialist Disability organisations;
3) To provide information and relevant training to other agencies locally on the needs of Young Carers, and;
4) To provide specialist Services to meet the needs of Young Carers appropriate to the levels of need.
This tender is offered in 5 Lots - each covering one of the 5 Health and Social Care Trusts areas. The HSCB wish to appoint a single Provider in each Lot to provide the Service in that Lot.
The objectives of this procurement are:
1) To provide a Young Carers Service which is connected, through partnership arrangements, to relevant local agencies, including Health and Social Care Trusts the Education Authority and Schools;
2) To provide information to Young Carers and source such information from appropriate agencies such as the HSC Trusts and specialist Disability organisations;
3) To provide information and relevant training to other agencies locally on the needs of Young Carers, and;
4) to provide specialist Services to meet the needs of Young Carers appropriate to the levels of need.
This tender is offered in 5 Lots - each covering one of the 5 Health and Social Care Trusts areas. The HSCB wish to appoint a single Provider in each Lot to provide the Service in that Lot.

INFO_ADD.P: The initial contract is 36 months with the potential to extend for 2 x 12 month periods. The estimated value of this contract for 3 years is 260 880,00 GBP if the extensions were invoked the value could potentially be 434 800,00 GBP.
There is also a potential for a 40% uplift in programme and activity costs as stated in the B document, therefore, the value could range from 260 880,00 GBP to 608 720,00 GBP.
